images.copyright: Masai giraffe mother grooming her calf in the Serengeti, Tanzania (© Alberto Cassani/Getty Images)
images.title: Spot the spots
images.caption: World Giraffe Day
images.desc: World Giraffe Day, celebrated on June 21, is a perfect opportunity to learn about the Serengeti and its iconic Masai giraffes. This annual event, organized by the Giraffe Conservation Foundation, raises awareness about the declining giraffe population, which has decreased by nearly 30% over the past 35 years.
